noBeforeInteractiveScriptOutsideDocument.description:
Description

Prevent usage ofnext/scriptâ€™sbeforeInteractivestrategy outside ofpages/_document.jsin a Next.js project.
Next.js provides anext/scriptcomponent to optimize the loading of third-party scripts. Using thebeforeInteractivestrategy allows scripts to be preloaded before any first-party code.beforeInteractivescripts must be placed inpages/_document.js.
This rule checks for any usage of thebeforeInteractivescripts outside of these files.
noBeforeInteractiveScriptOutsideDocument.option: This rule has no specific options.
